record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - December 04, 2007)

[Page: H14145]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have five legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on the subject of my Special Order.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Illinois?
